amendment.description: Amendment requires State and local governments receiving law enforcement block grants to provide a hiring preference to former members of the Armed Forces who were involuntarily separated or released from active duty on or after Oct. 1, 1990 and who wish to become law enforcement officers with State and local law enforcement agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require state and local governments receiving law enforcement block grants under the bill to provide a hiring preference to former members of the Armed Forces who were involuntarily separated or released from active duty on or after Oct. 1, 1990 and who wish to become law enforcement officers with state and local law enforcement agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ackerman amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
